articles.title: Revitalise your joint health with the power of Boswellia - Daily Mail
articles.description: A major hindrance to staying active is joint health. The NHS reports around 10 million people in the UK have a condition that affects their joints.
articles.content:
The NHS emphasises the importance of regular physical exercise as the key to staying healthy.
It has been shown that 150 minutes of physical activity a week can reduce the risk of health conditions … [+7393 chars]

articles.content:
